113.title: FMG

1131.content:
Tracy loved to bully others at school, because you see, at home she was the one getting bullied.
By her 3 years older twin siblings. Stella and Adrian.

They loved to compete with each other, almost as much as they loved to pick on Tracy for everything.

When Stella and Adrian were 14, both joined the gym to always be stronger than each other, making them one of the strongest students, if not people at school.

Adrian was about 1,89m and weighted 95kg of pure muscle, but Stella always were the strongest.
Standing at 1,78m and 110kg of muscle, but still DD tits.

One day both of them were in their basement, the home-gym, as Tracy decided to spy on them for once.
Both of them curling massive weights. She couldn't see how much it was, however Stella loved to brag about her record of 115kg for a few curls.

Letting out a loud grunt, Stella dropped the weights to the ground, cracking it beneath the barbell. She walked over to her bag, and grabbed a bottle of water.

"You can go up 'little' brother", Stella said with a smile, "I have some things to do."

Just like it was a command Adrian stood up and left the basement, without noticing Tracy hiding behind the door.

As soon as he left the room, Stella grabbed a small bottle with blue liquid and a syringe from her bag.

"That's how she got bigger than Adrian", Tracy said to herself as Stella injected the blue shimmering liquid into her veins.

Letting out a slight moan, she stored both in her bag and walked again to the barbell,
Tracy's eyes widened as Stella picked it up and made several repetitions like it was nothing. Tearing the fabric around her bulging biceps.
After 30 repetitions she seemed to lost motivation and just dropped the barbell again onto the ground.

"I need that and I need that now", Tracy thought as she sneaked back upstairs, to not get caught by her massive sister.


During the night Tracy couldn't sleep a second. She could only imagine herself with big rippling muscles, just as her siblings. No, bigger muscles.
So decided to sneak into the basement, hoping Stella would have a stock of those bottles.

Possibly hours passed until Tracy finally found what she was looking for. Inside of a container for protein powder there were several bottles and syringes.
Tracy quickly grabbed the container and rushed back into her room.

In her room and without further hesitation she filled a syringe with the blue liquid and injected it herself, just like she saw her sister do it.
A feeling, like her veins are burning started to appear, where she injected herself, which quickly spread over her whole body.
It was a wonderful feeling, her whole body burned as she began to pump her muscles, like her sister, first by doing push-ups, then by doing them one armed as it quickly became to easy for her or her growing muscles.

Slightly exhausted she stood up and walked in front of her mirror to flex.

"Disappointing", she said to herself.
You could clearly see a small peak on her biceps, the size of a tennis ball but she wanted more.

She took out three more vials of liquid, filled the syringe and injected it immediately.

The burning started again, more intense than before. Tracy bit her lip to not scream in pain, as she passed out.

As she woke up she saw her new self...
1131.title: Muscle Growth Serum

choices: someone third walked in on them.
11311.content:
The next morning.
As Tracy woke up, she could hear her sister grunting and moaning from the basement, doing her morning routine.

Their brother was only allowed to spot her at that time. She didn't allow anyone to get bigger than her.
Still a little bit dizzy and tired from the night before, she looked around her room. She was laying on the ground in the middle of her room. As she saw the container with the syringes from yesterday she smiled as her look wandered to her body.

She was massive.

Stunned she ran her fingers over her rippling midsection. Tracing each of her now eightpack individually, each of them harder than steel.
Tracy stood up and walked in front of the mirror of her room.
She didn't gain anything in height, making her huge frame look even more amazing.

Still with a huge grin on her face, she raised both arms for a double biceps flex.
Each of them covered in huge veins, almost pulsating with power.

"Even Arnold Schwarzenegger would be embarrassed by the sight of these babies", she said to herself, proceeding to flex in different poses making her biceps grow even more.

She grabbed her chest, massaging each breast with her muscular hands Moaning lightly doing so.
"Unfortunately" her chest didn't gain anything in size, yet she had massive pecs.

She went to her closet and grabbed a once loose fitting sweatshirt, to cover her massive figure. It was stretched to the max, but she didn't want to ruin her siblings suprise.

"Time to test these babies", she exclaimed as she left her room and walked downstairs to her siblings. The wooden stairs clearly suffered under the bear weight of each of her steps.

As Tracy reached the basement Stella was already done with her routine. Sitting on a bench only wearing a sports bra and shorts, revealing a gorgeous sight on her sixpack abs, covered with sweat.

"What are you doing here, Hobbit", Stella asked mockingly, "This is only for big people!"

Tracy ignored her sister and instead walked towards the weights, grabbing the 50kg barbell and started doing curls.

"Then why are you here?", she asked, still with a smile on her lips.

"Since when are you lifting", Adrian asked, slightly astonished by her little sister strength.

"A few minutes ago... This is too light", Tracy exclaimed. She walked over to her sister and grabbed the weight behind her, which Stella had used for bench presses a few minutes ago.

"Don't you think this is a little too hea..", Stella started, but stopped as she saw her sister lifting it with one hand and doing repetitions.

Tracy however was completely ignoring her sister, doing rep after rep, feeling the fabric stretch around her growing biceps.

Stella and Adrian were speechless and could only watch their 'little' sister lifting the weight like nothing.

After dozens of reps it finally happened. The fabric couldn't stand a chance against her muscles anymore and her arms bursted free through the sleeves.

"Screw this piece of shit", Tracy said grabbing the shirt and ripping it off of her body. Finally revealing her complete upper body to her siblings.
Tracy looked over to Adrian.
His eyes in shock, his jaw almost hitting the ground, as Tracy proceeded doing curls with her right arm and flexing her left arm as she looked over to Stella.

She seemed to love this sight. Her breathing noticeably quickened as she bit her lip. Her eyes gazing over every centimeter of her sisters body, as
11311.title: Much more muscular

choices: She finds an ad from a scientist in need of a test subject!
She finds a strange shop selling magic things!
She hears of a machine able to alter her!
114.content:
"Bitches..." Tracy mumbled as she was walking home.

The head cheerleader was in a really bad mood. As today, was the try outs day for the girls willing to become a cheerleader and join the squad. As the team captain, Tracy had of course been managing the whole thing with her usual, cruel pleasure: she told the nerds to leave without even doing a single exercise, she called a few other girls "fatties" and sent them away, and only kept the few ones left, as now, this little show probably reminded them of who was the boss.

The problem was: some of these girls were good. Like, really good. Tracy realized some of them were even girls she kicked out last year and now, tried again, but after training for a whole year, and after a nice boost from puberty. All of them were curvier than she was, and some of them even dared to dance better than her during the try outs.

When her own teammates clapped at the show, Tracy and her usual bitchy attitude exploded.

"Shut up!" Tracy had exclaimed "These girls are worthless!"
"But Tracy..." one of the cheerleaders had said "They're good. I mean, some even did things you never managed to do..."
"Yeah, like wearing a real bra!" whispered someone.

"Who said that?" Tracy asked angrily "Who spoke?"

But no one answered. Even the girls already in her team were siding up with the new girls? Shit... she felt terrible. As she hated not being the one fully dominating a situation. And right now, she was losing her grasp on her own team! She was furious, and almost unable to speak without screaming when her so-called "teammates" welcomed warmly the new girls in the squad, not even waiting for her approval.

"And the uniform looks so good on you!" said someone, speaking about a new girl with D cups when she tried the official shirt the first time.
"I know, right?" pouted the newcomer "I was made to be a cheerleader!"
"With these you could even be captain one day!"

Tracy was listening from a distance. The girls thought she was busy grumbling, but no. She was listening. And was worried about how, if things went on, she might soon be obeying to a a new captain, a girl stealing her place, and maybe even kicked of the team then because she'd never accept that...

She needed something to have her domination be totally undisputed. To have her superiority established, now and forever...

She needed a miracle.
114.title: Tracy's needs for options

choices: The self-destruct fails and Tracy transforms further
1141.content:
Tracy shivered under the thin patient gown. The exam room was cold. “This place is shady as hell,” she thought to herself. “This experiment had better be worth it.”

Dr. Benson entered, a seedy, stereotypical mad scientist. “Hello, Tracy,” he said. “How are we doing today?” He flashed a big fake smile, failing to hide his enjoyment at seeing the pretty cheerleader in the skimpy gown.

“Perv,” thought Tracy. Aloud, she said, “Fine, doc. Let’s get to it.”

The scientist bowed ostentatiously. “You’ll be testing a performance-enhancing `smart workout suit`. It’s worn during and immediately after training, and while you sleep. It increases the density of muscle, connective tissue, and bone, and speeds recovery from fatigue and injury.

“With this, you’ll be able to train harder for longer periods, and your gains will be much greater and longer-lasting. You’ll see increases in strength, endurance, flexibility significantly beyond the human baseline. Even a slowdown in the aging process.”

“Sounds exactly like what I need,” said Tracy, imagining how this “smart suit” would allow her to be a top cheerleader and dominate her rivals for literally decades to come.

“One more thing,” said Dr. Benson. “As you know, female athletes, have difficulty maintaining, ahem, their busts because they keep low bodyfat. We remedied this by designing the suit to selectively stimulate growth of mammary tissue.”

“You mean…” asked Tracy, even more excited. “You mean it’ll make my boobs bigger?”

“Over a long period of time, you should see significant gains, uh, up there,” said Dr. Benson, and this time he could not hide his leer.

“OK Doc,” said Tracy. “I’m sold. When do we start?”

Dr. Benson produced a container of metallic liquid. It shimmered silver in the light.

“That?” said Tracy scornfully. “That looks like…like liquid glitter.”

“It’s a `smart` metal,” said Dr. Benson. “Capable of adapting to almost any environment through self-directed molecular evolution. It can receive commands electronically.“ He opened the container. “Put your finger in there.”

Tracy did so. Dr. Benson started tapping commands into the keyboard of his tablet. “Now I’m optimizing the suit to your specific genetics and physique,” he explained.

Tracy gasped as the smart metal flowed out of the container and over her fingertip. Quickly it expanded to cover her arm and flowed beneath the thin gown. Within seconds it had coated her neck, her entire torso and nether areas, turning into a skintight one-piece leotard.

Tracy removed her gown and stared at her new workout gear. She ran her hands over the silvery outfit, admiring its metallic sheen.

The fit was perfect. It felt like she was wearing nothing at all. The suit caressed every cleft of her muscles, making them stand out more than if she had been nude. Yet she could move with total freedom, the suit hindered her movements not at all. She already felt more energized, as if she’d just had a good night’s sleep.

On a whim she leaped up, did a backflip and landed gracefully on the exam table. “Let’s hit the gym and test this baby out,” said Tracy. She jumped down to the ground and strode out the door, Dr. Benson following behind.

Over an hour later, Dr. Benson was astonished by the results. First Tracy had run a 10000 meter dash in a little over a half hour. Afterwards she hadn’t been winded or tired, she hadn’t even broken a sweat. She’d hit the weights immediately afterwards and had been pounding out reps for the last twenty minutes like a machine.

He took another look at her vital readings on his tablet. Her heart rate and BP were close to resting, her oxygen, electrolytes, and pH showed no indication that she had been exerting herself at peak level for the last hour. Astonishingly, her BMI had increased by two percent just in the one hour, a sign of increasing muscle density.

He went over to Tracy, who was doing bench presses. She was already up to one hundred fifty pounds of weight, after starting out at one hundred twenty. “You did great, Tracy,” he said.

“Thanks, Doc,” said Tracy, flashing a dazzling smile.

“But I think it’s time you took a break. I need to analyze the data, and you need to recover from this afternoon.”

“But I can keep going, Doc,” she insisted. “I want to keep going.” She grunted as she did another rep. “Never felt this good. It’s like a constant rush of energy. The more I work out the stronger I feel.” She did another rep, this one coming more easily than the last.

“Need to get stronger, need to get sexier,” she muttered to herself. “Need to stop those two-faced cheer bitches from coming for my throne. I will be queen of the cheer squad forever.” Another rep. “Queen of the school forever.” Another rep. “Queen of the whole fucking world forever!” Another rep.

Dr. Benson’s apprehension grew. Clearly the suit was affecting the subject’s mental stability—not that she had probably been that stable in the first place. Her power trip was putting the experiment in jeopardy, yet part of him wanted to see just how sexy and strong she would become.

Before he could decide on a course of action, Tracy racked the barbell and sat up. “This isn’t enough weight,” she said impatiently. “I barely feel it anymore. I need more.” Suddenly the suit began to liquefy and ripple. “What—what’s happening?”

Before Dr. Benson’s amazed eyes, the smart metal began to flow over the exposed parts of Tracy’s body. Within seconds it had completely engulfed her head to toe in a silvery second skin. Tracy stared at her metallic limbs in delight, all fear gone. She began giggling.

“Tracy,” said Dr. Benson. “We’ve got to get that suit off you, it’s out of control!”

Tracy scoffed. “I don’t WANT to,” she retorted. “I feel more powerful than I’ve ever been! I’m fucking UNSTOPPABLE!” She picked up the barbell and hurled it at Dr. Benson. He shied out of the way and it missed.

This finally shocked him into action. It wasn’t worth getting killed by a rampaging, power-mad cheerleader. He tapped furiously at his tablet. “I’m triggering the emergency self-destruct. It won’t hurt you, it’ll just deactivate the suit.”

“NO!” screamed Tracy. She charged Dr. Benson like a bull, knocked him down, sent the tablet flying. She stomped on it and shattered it into bits beneath her feet.

“Too late,” grunted Dr. Benson, nursing bruised ribs. “The experiment’s over. The suit’s useless now.”
1141.title: She finds an ad from a scientist in need of a t...

choices: Platinum Blonde takes revenge on Kendra and enslaves the cheer squad
11411.content:
“You bastard! You’ll pay for taking it from me!” snarled Tracy. She advanced on him in a rage, ready to tear him apart. All of a sudden she stopped and her expression grew distant, abstracted. “Your self-destruct failed,” she gasped in wonder. “It’s…it’s alive! And aware! I can hear it in my mind.” She paused. “What did you say? This is just the beginning? There’s much more where that came from?“ She laughed. “I accept your offer. Yes, yes, YES! Give it all to MEEEEEEEE!”

The surface of Tracy’s suit started to swirl and bubble, as if it were boiling. Then silvery tentacles shot out in all directions from it. They whirled around briefly, apparently seeking something, then each plunged into a power outlet. Electricity coursed along the tentacles and into Tracy, causing lightning to spark and sizzle continuously around her as she began to change. As the cheerleader greedily drained more and more energy from the power grid to fuel her metamorphosis, the lights began flickering on and off.

Finally, the tentacles retracted, the lightning glare faded, and Tracy reappeared. Not just transformed, but transfigured. A gorgeous, towering Amazon with shimmering platinum-colored skin. Her hair a gleaming mass of metallic gold tendrils, swirling in a whirlpool down her back. Her eyes now solid golden orbs glowing with their own light. Her perfect face a visage of inhuman beauty. The suit had formed spiky high heels, giving her an extra foot of height.

Gone was the slender figure, the flat chest. Tracy was now possessed of curves and muscles in impossible superabundance. Her nonexistent breasts had blown up into beachball-size megatits, thrusting forth like missiles from beefy pectorals. Her upper body had an insane V shape: wide shoulders, delts like boulders, massively jacked upper back tapered into a trim waist cut with a 10-pack of powerful abs. Her curvaceous hips flared out dramatically and flowed into a luscious ass with ripped glutes that jutted out half a foot behind her. Her arms and legs were packed with massive, bulging muscles that shifted visibly with the slightest movement, like icebergs in an arctic sea.

“The suit and I have fused into one!” proclaimed Tracy, her voice now deeper, more commanding, tinged with a metallic echo that sounded sexier and more intimidating than ever. “The smart metal is bonded to my cells now, to my very DNA, at the molecular level, allowing me to evolve in ways you never imagined possible. Already I am far beyond human! And soon I will be far more than even that!

“I am reborn! Tracy is no more! I am THE PLATINUM BLONDE!”

She took hold of the weight rack, piled with many tons of barbells. Her muscular arms swelled as she easily lifted the whole thing overhead. In a blur of motion, she powered the rack through the air and rammed it into the wall. The impact caused a tremor through the building and sent chunks of concrete flying and barbells clanging to the ground.

Platinum Blonde moved to stand below the rack, which was now firmly embedded in concrete, placed both hands on the wall, and began pushing against it. Her upper back and triceps bulged massively and cracks formed in the concrete as she increased the pressure. Finally it gave way completely as she successfully shoved her way THROUGH the wall in an astonishing demonstration of raw muscular might. It collapsed and buried her underneath.

At first Dr. Benson thought Platinum Blonde had killed herself. Then the debris quivered, and the platinumm Amazon burst up through the ruins of the wall, sending masonry and scrap metal flying in all directions. She flexed her arms. Her biceps surged and surged in response, finally crowning her mighty arms with massive pulsating mountains of steel-hard muscle, each one wider than a man’s waist. She threw her head back and let loose a primal, erotic roar of dominance and triumph.

Now completely terrified, Dr. Benson desperately pulled a gun from a concealed holster. “St-stay away from me,” he warned.

Platinum Blonde chuckled. Her hips swayed seductively, her muscles rippled gracefully as she sauntered toward him and struck a power pose with hands on her hips. “After what I just did, you think you can harm ME with that peashooter?”

Dr. Benson fired at Tracy’s chest. The bullets struck sparks as they deflected harmlessly off Platinum Blonde’s hypertrophic bosom. Her enormous silvery tits jiggled invitingly as the metal titaness laughed. “Even now I’m beyond your puny weapons, imagine what I’ll be after the next step of my evolution.”

She lifted her hand, palm outstretched. Dr. Benson’s gun briefly twitched this way and that in his hand, then flew straight out of his grip into the platinum Amazon’s. With contemptuous ease, she crushed the weapon and dropped the crumpled gunmetal.

“Kinetic force projection,” she gloated. She raised her hand again, and this time the unseen force yanked Dr. Benson towards Platinum Blonde, pulling him right into her grip. Her fingers closed around his neck and she lifted him from the ground, leaving his feet dangling helplessly in the air as he gurgled.

“Did you really want me to stay away?” mocked Platinum Blonde. “I think you want me to do something else to you, don’t you?” Dr. Benson gasped as the invisible force that had jerked him towards her now delicately caressed his crotch. His hardon stiffened further as he stared into those beautiful golden eyes.

“Behold your ultimate creation, Doctor. You’ve made a scientific breakthrough on par with Einstein and Hawking. You deserve Nobel Prizes, money, immortal glory! Sadly for you, there’s only room for one Platinum Blonde in this universe. I can’t let you duplicate your work. So…”

“Please,” whimpered Dr. Benson. “I’m begging you. I won’t ever test the smart metal on anyone else. I swear. Just please, please let me go. Please, Tracy!“

She stared at him in cold fury. “My name is PLATINUM BLONDE!” she declared. Her fist clenched, crushing Dr. Benson’s windpipe and killing him instantly. Platinum Blonde flung the body aside like a piece of trash.

The titaness thought about what to do next. She could take revenge on Kendra, the D-cup girl who had showed up at tryouts. That bitch needed to be shown her place; especially now that she, Platinum Blonde, was better-endowed than Kendra or any mortal could ever be. And the other cheerleaders needed to be reminded who was in charge. It was no longer enough that they followed her as head cheerleader; they needed to worship her as their muscle goddess.

Or she could go find some way to test her powers. The smart metal hummed in every cell of her being; it sang with the promise of unlimited potential. This was just the beginning, she could evolve much further and reach new levels of strength, sexiness, and power and develop abilities beyond mortal comprehension.

info.brief_description: A dominant female enhancement story. Will award 1,000 or more GP if a chapter is added.
info.description:
One of my favorite things is when a dominant female experiences some kind of enhancements like growth or gaining abilities making them even more dominant and or power hungry. Spoiled brats, bully’s, evil women like super villainess are examples. So anything involving enhancing the women is allowed whether it’d be Giantess, FMG, gaining powers or becoming goddesses with mean streaks.

WILL AWARD 1,000 or more GP FOR CHAPTERS ADDED

Way better writers here than me and would love to see your takes.

No enhancing males or TG transformations.

Not a fan of scat

Other than that anything goes.
